text: vi#ShNukraqmAn krama#tE suvaqrgAyaq hi lOqkAya# viShNukraqmAH kraqmyantE$ brahmavAqdinO# vadantiq satvai vi#ShNukraqmAn kra#mEtaq ya iqmAn ~MlOqkAn BrAtRu#vyasya saqM~Mvidyaq puna#riqmaM ~MlOqkaM pra#tyavaqrOhEqdityEqSha vA aqsya lOqkasya# pratyavarOqhO yadAhEqdamaqhamaqmuM BrAtRu#vyamAqByO diqgByO$&syai diqva itIqmAnEqva lOqkAn BrAtRu#vyasya saqM~Mvidyaq puna#riqmaM ~MlOqkaM praqtyava#rOhatiq saM - [  ] 26
